Gostar√≠amos de agradecer a todos os funcion√°rios, especialmente Libby, o gerente  (Original) When we arrive to look for a cat for our daughter we turned up unannounced but found the environment to be spotlessly clean and the cats seemed to be exceptionally well cared for, the staff where most knowledgeable and very helpful they had the time to spend with us and inform us of each cats individual circumstances and requirements, we have through there assistance been able to select a cat which meets our requirements and are happy to say we have re-homed a cat.
